casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Foronte MCPHAUL 421PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 2, 2018 Ms. Amanda S. Zimmer, Southern Pines, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McPhaul, Juan Foronte

Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Mr. William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina

Sara B. Warf, Clinical Assistant Professor of Law

Ms. Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 29th of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of July 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 31st day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
